name: AJINOMOTO EUROPE S.A.S.
goal: Ajinomoto is originally a Japan based company, leader in the development of amino acid technology. Ajinomoto's aim is to contribute to significant advances in food and health. Ajinomoto main sectors of activity are:  food and feed, amino science and health. In Europe Ajinomoto has facilities producing food products, feed ingredients, food supplements and pharma grade products. The regional head office for EMEA region is located in Paris
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, Food Safety, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Nutrition Policies
Trade: Eu-Japan free trade agreement. TBT
Food safety: Food Improvement Agents (additives, flavourings, enzymes), additives reevaluation
Food information to consumer: INCO/FIR
Novel foods
Pharmaceuticals: manufacture of amino acid based active pharma ingredients
Animal Nutrition: feed additives/feed additives reevaluation
